mapper.select:
/* 영양정보 등록요청 조회 */
SELECT nirr_num AS nirrNum, mbr_id AS mbrId, nirr_content AS nirrContent, nirr_date AS nirrDate, nirr_category AS nirrCategory, sc_code AS scCode, prr_admin AS prrAdmin, nirr_processing_date AS nirrProcessingDate, nirr_reason_content AS nirrReasonContent FROM nutrition_info_registration_request
